function Mental_LV3()
    -- //以下、精神LV.3の場合でのイベント

    -- .女装稽古【精神】LV.3「裸の付き合いに慣れましょう」

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")


    -- //BU：アキラ・部屋着（ニヤリ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM14.wav",0,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1372.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "So, for today's training~" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira made a clearly wicked face. And the training content she announced was the worst hell yet. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015" , 1000,false)

    -- //BG：黒バック
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015" , 1000,false)

    -- //SE：布の擦れる音
    PLAY_SE("SEa047.wav")
    --WAIT(800)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2660.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "P-Please let no one come..." ]])

    -- //SE：心臓音
PLAY_SE("SEa048.wav")
--WAIT(800)

    -- //SE：引き戸の開閉音
PLAY_SE("SEb004.wav")
--WAIT(800)
--PLAY_SE("SEb004.wav")

PLAY_BGM("BGM11.wav",0,true)

    -- //CG：女子生徒用シャワー（後ろを警戒）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV050ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    MSG([[ My heart was pounding as if it would burst, as I turned the shower handle. ]])

    -- //SE：シャワー音
    --PLAY_SE("SEb058.wav",1000,true)
    PLAY_SE("SEb058.wav")

    MSG([[ Warm droplets patted against my skin. Realizing once again that I was exposing my bare skin made my heart race even more. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though there was no one else, I found myself adjusting the towel wrapped around my body. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2661.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "At this time after school... no one will come, right?" ]])

    MSG([[ The instruction from Akira was to use the shower room installed in Yuriai Private Academy’s gym. ]])

    MSG([[ From the academy pamphlet, Akira knew it was a private room, and thought to use it as a test of courage. ]])

    STOP_SE("SEb058.wav")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask010",1000,false)

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000)

    -- //BU：アキラ・部屋着（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1373.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "With Minato's body, as long as the elephant between your legs isn't seen, you'll be okay." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1374.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Experiencing being naked in an all-female academy will surely build great confidence. So, I’m looking forward to your report." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask010",1000,false)

    -- //CG：女子生徒用シャワー（後ろを警戒）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV050ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2662.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "That face... she was definitely enjoying my reaction." ]])

    MSG([[ There's no use complaining, so I’m following her instructions like this. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though there was only one door separating us, exposing my bare skin felt much more nerve-wracking than I thought. ]])

    MSG([[ Plus, the door was made of frosted glass and the other side was visible, making it even worse. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2663.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Please, no one come inside on the other side." ]])

    -- //SE：騒ぐ声
PLAY_SE("SEf025_2.wav",0,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2664.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ah..." ]])

    MSG([[ The flag was immediately triggered. ]])

    MSG([[ As if my anxiety had materialized, lively voices approached the shower room. ]])

    MSG([[ Listening carefully, the voices sounded familiar. ]])

STOP_SE("SEf025_2.wav",1000)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0209.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Uran-sama, your skin is as translucent and beautiful as ever. What kind of care do you do?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Fufu, I don't do anything special. A regular lifestyle and well-balanced nutrition—that’s what I think is most important." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1012.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Also, I always take a bath after sweating in class. Leaving sweat on your skin is the enemy of your complexion." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0210.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Such admirable dedication. As expected of our 'Princess Priestess'." ]])

    -- //CG：女子生徒用シャワー（扉に肌色がいっぱい、エリカ半泣き）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV050ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2665.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Aaaaaahhhhhhh... Wh-why is this happening...?) ]])

    MSG([[ On the other side of the door, there was a lot of skin visible. ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing or being seen is a no-go. In this situation, I can barely leave the shower room. ]])

    MSG([[ To put it mildly, this is the worst situation. ]])

    MSG([[ My warmed body grew even hotter with tension. At this rate, I might pass out from the shower. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1013.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "It’s rare for someone to be using this at this time. Are you a first-year?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0211.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Even though Uran-sama is here, you don’t even show your face? How disrespectful! Come out quickly!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0212.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Come on out, waaah!" ]])

    -- //SE：ノック音
PLAY_SE("SEb010.wav")
--WAIT(800)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2666.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eek...!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1014.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Please stop. It is our fault for not checking if anyone was using it." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1015.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Even as a 'Princess', there is no priority right to use the academy facilities." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0213.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "U-Uran-sama... we’re very sorry." ]])

    MSG([[ Uran gently stopped the student who seemed to be a 'knight' and continued speaking. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1016.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "If we stay here, we would only make her nervous. For now, let us leave the area." ]])

    -- //CG：女子生徒用シャワー（後ろを警戒）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV050ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    MSG([[ The students apparently obeyed Uran’s words and quietly left. ]])

    MSG([[ Relieved by this unexpected luck, I patted my chest. ]])

    -- //CG：女子生徒用シャワー（扉にウランの影、エリカ後ろを警戒）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV050ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "You are Erika, correct?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2667.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eek!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1018.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Fufu, that tone... just as I thought." ]])

    MSG([[ I saw Uran smile through the door. It seemed she recognized me and acted accordingly. ]])

    MSG([[ Recognizing through the frosted glass that the skin was Uran’s made my heart race unusually. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1019.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "My 'knights' have seen your face, and it would be bad to provoke trouble. I will step out for a while, so please quietly escape during that time." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2668.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Th-thank you very much. You really saved me... I’m sorry for causing trouble with my carelessness." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_1020.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Fufufu, such situations are unavoidable. If it weren’t a private room, I would gladly help wash your back... but it’s regrettable." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2669.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ah, haha..." ]])

    MSG([[ If it weren’t a private room, I would have both hands tied. ]])

    MSG([[ I genuinely felt relief that there was just one door separating us. ]])

    -- //CG：女子生徒用シャワー（後ろを警戒）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV050ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    MSG([[ And so, I was left alone in the shower room again. ]])

    MSG([[ I must not waste Uran’s kindness. I’ll quickly dry my body, change, and go outside. ]])

    -- //CI：CG『女子生徒用シャワー（扉のウランの影）』ウランの部分をアップ 086
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI086a")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009",1000,false)

    MSG([[ But then—the image of Uran’s body I glimpsed earlier flashed through my mind. ]])

    MSG([[ Maybe because it’s the first time I’ve seen a woman’s naked body other than my sister Marika, it burned into my brain and wouldn’t leave. ]])

    MSG([[ Naturally, the lower part of my body began heating up— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask010",1000,false)

    -- //CG：女子生徒用シャワー（エリカ半泣き）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV050aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2670.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Wha...!? W-w-w-wait... why now of all times..." ]])

    MSG([[ The towel wrapped around me began rolling up. ]])

    MSG([[ The "other me" trying to break through the cloth was forcefully pushed back beneath the towel. ]])

    MSG([[ What should I do? If I go out like this and someone sees me by some chance... ]])

    MSG([[ But if I wait for this to calm down, Uran and the others will come back again. ]])

PLAY_SE("SEb004.wav")

    MSG([[ —I have to go. I opened the door with desperate resolve and dashed out of the shower room. ]])

    -- //BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Though there were many unexpected incidents like this... ]])

    MSG([[ Just as Akira planned, I succeeded in building mental toughness that wouldn’t be shaken so easily. ]])

    -- Mental パラメーター更新
    SaveData.TrainingParam.Mental = 3

    -- 3	オトメ＊ベッドイン	『精神』レベルを１以上にした
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(3)
    -- 6	花摘む乙女に祝福を	『精神』レベルを２以上にした
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(6)
    -- 10	悔いは友を呼ぶ	『精神』レベルを３以上にした
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(10)
    if SaveData.TrainingParam.Visual >= 2 and SaveData.TrainingParam.Intelligence >= 2 and SaveData.TrainingParam.Mental >= 2 then
        -- 7	ドンストップ！エリカくん	すべてのステータスのレベルを２以上にした
        UNLOCK_TROPHY(7)
    end

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    TrainingStatusUp("Mental" , 3)

    ScenarioManager.TrainingNext()
end
